welcome_message_body: Welcome to Brampton, Canada! Get ready to experience the charming and diverse city known for its beautiful parks, cultural events, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Brampton has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Pho Viet Nam Restaurant
restaurants.description: Pho Viet Nam Restaurant is a vietnamese restaurant located in Brampton.
restaurants.address: 14 Main St. S. (Buffy Lane), Brampton ON L6W 2C3

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and newest terminal at Lester B. Pearson International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Lester B. Pearson International Airport, serving primarily international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Connect to the network and follow the prompts to access.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Buttonville Municipal Airport serves as the primary hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Buttonville Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
